title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Aroma Sense, operated by Julio Oliveira and Leonardo Ramos, collects, uses, stores and protects information from users who access and use our services.
agreement: By using the Aroma Sense website, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

section1.title: 1. Information Collected
section1.content: Aroma Sense collects only the information strictly necessary for e-commerce operation and user experience personalization.
items: Navigation cookies: used to improve user experience and personalize recommendations.
section1.sensitive: Aroma Sense does not collect sensitive data, such as CPF, address, phone or payment information directly in its database â€” this data is securely processed by payment providers.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Collection
section2.intro: Data is collected for the following purposes:
purposes: Allow access to user account (login and authentication);
Offer personalized recommendations based on user preferences;
Improve navigation experience and website personalization;

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section3.intro: Aroma Sense uses cookies and similar technologies to:
uses: Improve recommendations made by artificial intelligence.
section3.control: Users can disable cookies in their browser settings, but this may limit certain website functionalities.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: Aroma Sense does not share users' personal information with third parties, except when necessary for:
exceptions: Payment processing (via partners such as payment gateways);
Compliance with legal or regulatory obligations.
section4.noSale: In no case is data sold, rented or transferred for external marketing purposes.

section5.title: 5. Storage and Security
section5.content: Data is stored in secure environments, with appropriate technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, destruction, loss or improper alteration.
section5.passwords: Passwords are encrypted and not viewed by our team. Despite efforts, no system is 100% secure. In case of a security incident that compromises personal data, Aroma Sense will notify affected users as required by LGPD.

section6.title: 6. User Rights (LGPD)
section6.intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), users have the right to:
rights: Request account and personal data deletion;

deactivationRights.title: 6.1 Rights in Case of Account Deactivation
deactivationRights.content: If your account is deactivated by the platform, you have the right to:
rights: Receive clear notification about deactivation reasons;
Be informed about the available appeal process;
Request review of the decision by the support team;
Receive confirmation of definitive data deletion when applicable.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention and Deletion
section7.intro: User data will be kept only for the time necessary to:
purposes: Fulfill the purposes described in this Policy;
Preserve legitimate rights and interests of the platform.

platformDeactivation.title: 7.1 Platform Account Deactivation
platformDeactivation.content: In addition to deletion upon user request, Aroma Sense may deactivate accounts as described in the Terms of Use. In case of deactivation due to violation or other reasons, data will be kept for up to 2 years for audit purposes, legal compliance and fraud protection, after which it will be permanently deleted, except when required by law for a longer period.

section7.postClosure: After account closure (whether by user request or platform decision), data will be securely and permanently removed, keeping only minimal records necessary for legal compliance.

section8.title: 8. Artificial Intelligence and Personalization
section8.content: Aroma Sense uses artificial intelligence algorithms to suggest perfumes based on user preferences and interactions. These recommendations are automatic and do not involve direct human decisions. No legal, financial or personal decisions are made exclusively through AI.

section9.title: 9. Policy Changes
section9.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect improvements or legal changes. We recommend regular reading of this page to stay informed about possible changes.
